channel.title: Fairy Tale + You Got It All Wrong
channel.description:
Here's how it goes. You type in one sentence to add to the story with each post. Then, the person that posts after you says, you got it all wrong, and changes the setence up [b]A LITTLE BIT.[/b] Then they post another sentence.
Example.
[b]Poster #1-[/b]Once upon a time, there was a magical kingdom named Jahusafar.
[b]Poster #2-[/b]You got it all wrong. Once upon a time, there was an EVIL kingdom named SUNDANCER.
While at SunDancer, Joe noticed something very round.
[b]Poster #3-[/b] You got it all wrong. While at SunDancer, TOM FAILED TO NOTICE something very SQUARE.
This was a mistake he would soon regret.
Get it?
Rules:
[b]-DO NOT CHANGE THE WHOLE SENTENCE.[/b]
[b]-You must include that they got it all wrong, and give another part of the story.[/b]
[b]-Continue the Story, do not make a new one.[/b]
[b]-You can't have everybody die.[/b]
I'll start it off.
One day, my friend Jimmy took a walk through the local park.

item.title: Fairy Tale + You Got It All Wrong
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Erj, post:13, topic:37979”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=53673.msg663388#msg663388 date=1166759556]
You got it all wrong. Miss SilabSoft is seski.

But Jamie never made it.
[/quote]
You got it all wrong. Jamie did make it,
but his hot sister fell down the stairs, cracked her neck, and broke her spinal cord.[/quote]
You got it all wrong, she only broke her spinal cord.
But, she was killed.

(Oh and btw I like your thread IcyPimp, so Swift, STFU)[/quote]

I thought you were explaining something about me at first

item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

You got it all wrong. One day, my friend Jamie took a stroll through the local woods.

This was a beautiful place where little critters scurried through the leaves and birds sang high up in the trees.
